headline: Carnival Corporation (CCL) Valuation Check After Record Revenue And Earnings With New Destination Investments
summary: Carnival Corporation & (CCL) just reported record revenue of US$26.6b and record adjusted net income of US$3.1b, supported by US$7.2b in customer deposits and new private destinations such as Celebration Key. See our latest analysis for Carnival Corporation &. Against this backdrop of record results and new destinations, Carnival’s recent share price performance has cooled, with a 30 day share price return of 12.27% and a year to date share price decline of 8.64%. This comes even as the 3...
